戭字的基本解释

戭
yǎn
用以刺击的长枪。

戭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǎn］
［《廣韻》以淺切，上獮，以。］
［《廣韻》余忍切，上軫，以。］
(1)长枪。
(2)人名。檮戭。古代贤人，“八愷”之一。见《左传·文公十八年》。

戭字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【戈字部】　戭； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页413第41
【唐韻】余忍切【集韻】【韻會】以忍切，?音引。【說文】長槍也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?以淺切，音衍。人名。【左傳·文十八年】高陽氏才子檮戭。【釋文】以善反。亦作已震反。　又【集韻】柱兗切。音篆。義同。　又以久切，音酉。長盾也。　又羊進切。矛屬也。

Basic explanation of words
戭
yǎn
Long spear used for stabbing.
戭
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǎn］
["Guangyun" is cut in shallow, on the top, with. ]
["Guangyun" Yu Renqie, Shang Zhen, Yi. ]
(1) Long spear.
(2) The name of the person.梼戭. Ancient wise man, one of the "Eight Kai". See "Zuo Zhuan·Eighteen Years of Wengong".
戭
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Ge Zi Department] 　戭; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 413-41
[Tang Yun] Yu Renqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Cut with forbearance, quotation by sound. [Said the text] The spear is also.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Cut in shallow, and sound. Person's name. [Zuo Zhuan·Eighteenth Year of Wen] Gaoyang's gifted scholar Yingxu. 【Explanation】Reverse with good. It has also been shocked.　 [Ji Yun] Zhu Yan cut. Sound seal. The same meaning.　It takes a long time to cut again, sound you. Long shield also.　 Sheep cut again. Spears are also.
